column5: SMRT shareholders meeting is on the 25th They havent even mentioned stock price in a conference call since the slide from 350 began last year Hope someone goes an raises hell I voted no to all officers
SMRT have 20 million in cash Defense your stock and do a five million dollar buy back at these levels That is if you believe at all in your company
SMRT 10 more cents lower and they will have more cash on hand then market cap What gives
SMRT isnt the share holders meeting coming up Time to raise hell
SMRT also who is sitting there putting an ask in at 7393 Penny socks dont even trade like this
SMRT volume is heavy Some unloaded at bid Mitchel called it quits on monthly sells and sold all What gives
SMRT this will be sub 50 cents in the coming weeks
SMRT did I miss some bad news WTF
SMRT the presentation today must be going very well
